title: Instrument File Schema
description: Schema for instrument file data containing financial instrument information

numberOfMessages.description: Number of messages/instruments within the file

financialInstrumentIdentificationSource.description: Financial instrument source identifier within the Exchange system

financialInstrumentIdentificationExchang.description: Exchange or market identifier where the financial instrument is listed or traded

asset.description: Identifies the commodity code to which the instrument is linked

assetDescription.description: Describes the commodity to which the instrument is linked

market.description: Market where the commodity is registered - 2nd level of commodity registration
market.$comment: Consultar a lista na tabela ExternalMarketCode

segment.description: Segment where the commodity is registered - 1st level of commodity registration
segment.$comment: Consultar a lista na tabela ExternalSegmentCode

tickerSymbol.description: Code that publicly represents the financial instrument in the market

collateralIndicator.description: Indicates the instrument that can be used as collateral at A5X

securityCategory.$comment: Consultar a lista na tabela ExternalSecurityCategory

isin.description: ISIN Identifier - Identificador Internacional de Instrumentos
isin.$comment: Structure BR AAAA BBB CC D where: BR=Brazil country code, AAAA=issuer identification (alphanumeric), BBB=asset type (alphanumeric), CC=species or sequence (alphanumeric), D=check digit (numeric)

cfiCode.description: Classification of Financial Instruments code - ISO 10962 standard

currencyCode.$comment: Consultar a lista na tabela ExternalCurrencyCode

cusipIdentification.description: CUSIP - Committee on Uniform Securities Identification Procedures

issuerCountry.$comment: Consultar a lista na tabela ExternalCountryCode

issuePriceAmount.description: Issue price monetary amount with up to 10 decimal places

brazilianFederalGovernmentBondTypeCode.description: Brazilian Federal Government Bond type classifier

maturityValueAmount.description: Maturity value monetary amount with up to 10 decimal places

baseDatePriceAmount.description: Base date price monetary amount with up to 10 decimal places

programLevel.$comment: Consultar a lista na tabela ExternalProgramLevelTypeCode

proportionAmount.description: Proportion monetary amount with up to 5 decimal places

allocationRoundLot.description: Predefined lot size for allocation purposes

priceFactor.description: Factor indicating the number of shares used for price formation

marketCapitalisationAmount.description: Market capitalisation monetary amount with up to 2 decimal places

firstPriceAmount.description: First price monetary amount with up to 10 decimal places

lastPriceAmount.description: Last price monetary amount with up to 10 decimal places

governanceIndicator.$comment: Consultar a lista na tabela ExternalGovernanceIndicatorCode

rightsIssuePriceAmount.description: Rights issue price monetary amount with up to 10 decimal places

issueCode.description: Code that identifies a security issuance

assetCollateralType.$comment: Consultar a lista na tabela ExternalAssetCollateralTypeCode

assetAdditionalCollateralType.description: Identifies the additional collateral type of the security
assetAdditionalCollateralType.$comment: Consultar a lista na tabela ExternalAssetAdditionalCollateralTypeCode

assetSubordinatedType.description: Identifies the subordination type of the security
assetSubordinatedType.$comment: Consultar a lista na tabela ExternalAssetSubordinatedTypeCode

indexPercentageAmount.description: Index percentage monetary amount with up to 4 decimal places

interestRateCorrectionType.description: Provides the interest rate correction type
interestRateCorrectionType.$comment: Consultar a lista na tabela ExternalInterestRateCorrectionTypeCode

interestRateCorrectionTimeBase.description: Provides the basis for interest rate correction time base
interestRateCorrectionTimeBase.$comment: Consultar a lista na tabela ExternalInterestRateCorrectionTimeBase

earlyRedemptionIndicator.description: Indicates if early redemption is allowed

totalSeriesIssueValueAmount.description: Total series issue value monetary amount with up to 8 decimal places

unitValueAmount.description: Unit value monetary amount with up to 2 decimal places

valueTypeCode.description: Code that defines the instrument value type
valueTypeCode.$comment: Consultar a lista na tabela ExternalValueTypeCode

baseCode.description: Number of days for instrument calculation (252, 360, 365, etc)

conversionCriteria.$comment: Consultar a lista na tabela ExternalConversionCriteriaTypeCode

maturityDateTargetPoint.description: Number of points at maturity for rate-traded contracts

requiredConversionIndicator.description: Indicates if the rate-traded contract should be converted to price

contractMultiplier.description: Ratio between contract size and commodity quotation quantity

assetQuotationQuantity.description: Indicates the commodity quantity on which the trade price is based

assetSettlementIndicatorSecuritySource.description: Financial instrument source identifier for settlement

assetSettlementIndicatorSecurityExchange.description: Financial instrument exchange identifier for settlement

exercisePriceAmount.description: Exercise price monetary amount with up to 10 decimal places

exerciseStyle.description: Code that defines how an option can be exercised
exerciseStyle.$comment: Consultar a lista na tabela ExternalExerciseStyleCode

optionType.description: Specifies whether an option is call or put

premiumUpfrontIndicator.description: Indicates whether the stock option has its premium paid in advance or not

protectionFlag.description: Indicates that the option is protected against corporate events

automaticExerciseIndicator.description: Defines if the option is exercised automatically
